notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was financially supported by grants from the National Health Research Institutes (grant no. IV-107-PP-13 and IV-107-SP-11); Ministry of Science and Technology (grant no. MOST 102–2321-B-006-023 and 104–2321-B-006-002); Centers of Disease Control, Ministry of Health and Welfare; and Center of Infectious Diseases and Signaling Research, National Cheng Kung University, Aim for the Top University Project, Ministry of Education, Taiwan.
